com.github.errantlinguist.io
Class XmlFileParser

java.lang.Object
  com.github.errantlinguist.io.XmlFileParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileParser<Document>
public class XmlFileParser
extends Object
implements FileParser<Document>

A FileParser implementation which parses a single line of well-formed XML and returns it as a new Document object.

Since:
2011-07-06
Version:
2011-08-04
Author:
Todd Shore

Method Detail

makeXMLDeclaration

private static String makeXMLDeclaration(double xmlVersion,
                                         String encoding)
Creates an XML declaration for appending to XML strings which do not feature one.

Parameters:
xmlVersion - The XML version with which an input String is compliant.
encoding - The encoding scheme used to encode an input XML String.
Returns:
A String denoting an XML declaration, e.g.  <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>.
